text:
Dear Sir/Madam,
 
Attached, you will find a letter from Mr. Ravnachki, Executive Director of Bulgartransgaz regarding the upcoming "Shippers Day" hybrid event, scheduled for the 22nd of May 2024 in Athens, Greece, in connection with the Binding Phase of the projects for incremental capacity along the Vertical Gas Corridor.
 
You can request your participation in the event via the following link:
https://www.eventora.com/en/Events/VerticalCorridorInitiativeMay2024
 
 
Sincerely,
 
Slav Slavov
Chief Specialist
"Business Planning and Development" sector
Bulgartransgaz EAD

e-mail: Slav.Slavov@bulgartransgaz.bg
tel: +359 2 939 6549, www.bulgartransgaz.bg

Lulin 2 District
66 Pancho Vladigerov Blvd.
1336 Sofia, PO box 3
Bulgaria
 
 
________________________________


This email may contain confidential and/or legally privileged information. It is intended exclusively for the addressee(s). 
As our company operates in accordance with the requirements of GDPR we perceive any disclosure, copying, distribution or any other action with this information as strictly prohibited. In case this message has been sent to you by mistake, please inform us so we can ensure this does not occur anymore and then delete the message and the attachments there to from your system. 
In case of any inquiries related to GDPR compliance or data protection, please contact our Data Protection Officer at the following email address: dlzd@bulgartransgaz.bg. 
Thank you for your cooperation!” 

________________________________

Този имейл може да съдържа поверителна и/или юридически привилегирована информация. Тя е предназначена изключително за адресата/ите.
Тъй като нашето Дружество осъществява дейността си в съответствие с изискванията на GDPR възприемаме всяко разкриване, копиране, разпространение и всяко друго действие с тази информация, като строго забранено. В случай, че това съобщение е изпратено до Вас по грешка, моля уведомете ни, за да гарантираме, че това няма да се случва повече и след това изтрийте съобщението и прикачената информация от вашата система.
За всякакви запитвания, свързани със спазването на изискванията на GDPR или защитата на данните, винаги можете да се свържете с нашето длъжностно лице по защита на данните на следния имейл адрес: dlzd@bulgartransgaz.bg.
Благодаря Ви за съдействието!"
subject: Letter of Invitation from Bulgartransgaz for the "Shippers day" event on 22.05.2024 in Athens,Greece
attachmentsData:

Bulgartransgaz EAD
SUBJECT: INVITATION FOR THE SHIPPERS DAY EVENT ON 22 MAY 2024 IN ATHENS,
GREECE, IN CONNECTION WITH THE BINDING PHASE OF THE PROJECTS FOR
INCREMENTAL CAPACITY ALONG THE VERTICAL GAS CORRIDOR
DEAR SIR/MADAM,
On 2 May 2024, Bulgartransgaz EAD published on its website joint notices with DESFA S.A.
(Greece), Transgaz S.A. (Romania) and ICGB AD for the binding phase of the incremental
Zagora.
capacity process respectively at IP Kulata/Sidirikastro, IP Negru voda 1/Kardam and IP Stara
The incremental capacity projects planned by Bulgartransgaz EAD are a key part of the
Vertical Gas Corridor initiative of the transmission system operators Bulgartransgaz EAD,
DESFA S.A., ICGB AD, Gastrade S.A., Transgaz S.A., FGSZ Ltd., Eustream a.s., Gas TSO of
Ukraine LLC and VestMoldTransgaz S.R.L. The implementation of these projects will be
essential for the development of the natural gas market and ensuring the security of supply
and the diversification of natural gas supplies for the countries of South-Eastern, Eastern and
Central Europe.
We would like to hereby invite you to take part in the Shippers Day event on 22 May. The
Shippers Day is organised jointly by the operators who are signatories to the Memorandum
of Understanding in relation to the Vertical Gas Corridor initiative (VGC).
The host of the event will be DESFA S.A. and will be held in a hybrid format (online and in
person) at 10:00 - 15:30 (EET) on 22 May 2024 in Amarilia hotel, Agiou Nikolaou str.,
Vouliagmeni, Athens, Greece.
At the event, the gas operators will present detailed information on the binding phase of the
incremental capacity process launched by the operators in May and the conditions for
registration and participation, as well as on the planned infrastructure expansion projects
along the Vertical Corridor.
You can request your participation in the Shippers Day by completing an electronic request
form on: https://www.eventora.com/en/Events/VerticalCorridorInitiativeMay2024.
The language of the event will be English.
We look forward to your participation in this important event.
Yours sincerely,
KIRIL RAVNACHKI Equally
Executive Director
ОД-ВН-004, 403
Bulgartransgaz EAD
1336 Sofia, PO Box 3
66 Pancho Vladigerov Blvd.
